channel.title: Reading Log

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.dc:creator: Zane Billings
item.description: This is my first blog post. I created this to make sure I know how to make a blog post.

item.title: 2022-04-08: Immune imprinting and epitope masking!
item.dc:creator: Zane Billings
item.description: Today I read 'Influenza immunization in the context of preexisting immunity' by Linderman et al. from Cold Spring Harbor Perspectives in Medicine (2021). This review discusses how influenza vaccines can induce different immune responses based on an individual's immune profile prior to vaccination. A few mechanisms and previous results explaining this phenomenon are discussed, including immune imprinting and epitope masking.
